display_artist: Brandy, Tamia, Gladys Knight & Chaka Khan
lyrics:
Chorus:Though I'm missing you
(Although I'm missing you)
I'll find a way to get through
(I'll find a way to get through)
Living without you
'Cause you were my sister, my strength, and my pride
Only God may know why, still I will get by

Who would've known
That you'd have to go
So suddenly and so fast
How could it be
That a sweet memory
Would be all
All that we have left

But know that you're gone
Everyday I go on
(I go on)
But life's just not the same
(Life's just not the same)
I'm so empty inside
And my tears I can't hide
But I'll try, I'll try to face the pain

Oh, there were so many things
That we could have shared, uh-huh
If time was on our ide
(Time was on our side)
Now that you're gone
I can still feel you near
So I'll smile
With every tear I cry

How sweet, were the losses to spare?
But I'll wait for the day
When I see you again
See you again

I'm missing you>
